modules.title: Real-time usage
modules.description: Users currently on the GOV.UK Carer's Allowance service
info: Shows the estimated number of users currently accessing the GOV.UK start page for the Carer's Allowance transaction.

modules.title: Service availability
modules.description: How fast and how reliable the service is
info: Page load time measures the time taken for a sample page within the service to load.
Uptime measures the percentage of time that the service was observed to be available.
